42.heading: Perkins, Elizabeth, 1960-
42.title: The Flintstones [videorecording]
42.author: a Hanna-Barbera/Amblin Entertainment production ; Universal City Studios, Inc.
notes: 1 videocassette (91 min.) : sd., col. ; 1/2 in.
VHS format.
Cast: John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Elizabeth Perkins, Rosie O'Donnell, Kyle MacLachlan, Halle Berry, Elizabeth Taylor.

Writers, Tom S. Parker, Jim Jennewein, Steven E. de Souza ; producer, Bruce Cohen ; director, Brian Levant ; music, David Newman ; executive producers, William Hanna, Joseph Barbera, Kathleen Kennedy, David Kirschner, Gerald R. Molen.

Summary (from OCLC cataloging): Cliff Vandercave & his accomplice plan a robbery but they need a stooge (Fred Flintstone) to take the rap. A sudden promotion (part of their scheme) puts Fred in the executive suite, while Barney's luck takes a turn for the worse.

67.title: Perky & Beanz

notes: Summary: Appearances are deceiving, because really he's hunting gophers with a golf club.

68.title: Perky & Beanz
68.author: Russell Myers.
68.series: Jan. 1, 1987) "What an Enormous Jar of Leeches!"*
notes: Summary: Perky is nervous about seeing the doctor, because Yoyo was teasing her about hypodermic needles, etc.

69.title: Perky & Beanz
69.author: Russell Myers.
69.series: Jan. 2, 1987) "But the Floor is Usually Littered with Parents"*
notes: Summary: The doctor puts a stitch in Perky's cut, and says she's never lost a child yet. Beanz faints.

70.title: Perky & Beanz
70.author: Russell Myers.
70.series: Jan. 3, 1987) "The Hearing Aid She Had To Wear Now Isn't Working Right"*
notes: Summary: Perky pretends she can't hear because of the stitch in her ear, and Beanz faints again.

71.title: Perky & Beanz
71.author: Russell Myers.
71.series: Jan. 5, 1987) "Never Use as Much Toothpaste as They Do in the Commercials"

72.title: Perky & Beanz
72.author: Russell Myers.
72.series: Jan. 6, 1987) "Now There's a Man Who Knows How to Make His Dog Happy!"*
notes: Summary: Beanz has bought an artificial Christmas tree, and Yoyo is pleased.

73.title: Perky & Beanz
73.author: Russell Myers.
73.series: Jan. 7, 1987) "I've Got the Opthalmologist. What's a Good Time?"*
notes: Summary: Beanz claims he doesn't need reading glasses.

74.title: Perky & Beanz
74.author: Russell Myers.
74.series: Jan. 8, 1987) "It's a Good Thing I Don't Have Fishing Worms"*
notes: Summary: Perky and her friends are standing with their mouths wide open pretending to be baby birds, asking Beanz for food.

75.title: Perky & Beanz
75.author: Russell Myers.
75.series: Jan. 9, 1987) "I'm Late Giving Yoyo His Food"*
notes: Summary: Yoyo has dived into his empty dog dish.

76.title: Perky & Beanz
76.author: Russell Myers.
76.series: Jan. 10, 1987) "There are Still Three Needles Left!"*
notes: Summary: Perky & Beanz disagree about taking down the Christmas tree.

77.title: Perky & Beanz
77.author: Russell Myers.
77.series: Jan. 12, 1987) "Will This Surprise Have Me Hurtling Hundreds of Feet Through the Air, Too?"*
notes: Summary: Perky tries to move Beanz from hang gliding to downhill skiing.

78.title: Perky & Beanz
78.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Perky has a special senior citizen's ski jacket for Beanz.

79.title: Perky & Beanz
79.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Beanz is ready for more advanced skiing tomorrow.

80.title: Perky & Beanz
80.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: The ski instructor wants Beanz to tighten up a little.

81.title: Perky & Beanz
81.author: Russell Myers.
81.series: Jan. 17, 1987) "The Bravest Person in This Family"*
notes: Summary: Beanz is proud that he's mastered the beginner's slope, and in the background Perky and Yoyo are flying off a ski jump with one ski between them.

82.title: Perky & Beanz
82.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Perky has found Beanz yet another new hobby, and he thinks that after hang gliding and skiing there isn't another way to hurtle through the air.

83.title: Perky & Beanz
83.author: Russell Myers.
83.series: Jan. 20, 1987) "I Already Paid Our $200 to the We Won't Take No For An Answer Skydiving School!"*
notes: Summary: Beanz says he won't skydive.

84.title: Perky & Beanz
84.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: The skydiving instructors give a bonus to clients that don't give them trouble.

85.title: Perky & Beanz
85.author: Russell Myers.
85.series: Jan. 22, 1987) "This is a First for Us, Ain't It, Ted?"*
notes: Summary: Beanz doesn't want to do any sport he can't do in his easy chair, so the skydiving instructors carry him to the airport in it.

86.title: Perky & Beanz
86.author: Russell Myers.
86.series: Jan. 23, 1987) "But What if this Chute Doesn't Open?"*
notes: Summary: The skydiving school is prepared for mishaps: Yoyo is standing on the ground with a butterfly net.

87.title: Perky & Beanz
87.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: The skydiving instructors make a joke about beaming Beanz back up, and Beanz pushes them both out of the plane.

88.title: Perky & Beanz
88.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: The good fairy appears to Perky and suggests a good deed for the day.

89.title: Perky & Beanz
89.author: Russell Myers.
89.series: Jan. 27, 1987) "Shovel the Sidewalk and Call Me When It's Clear, Yoyo!"*
notes: Summary: Yoyo piles the snow in the doorway.

90.title: Perky & Beanz

90.series: Jan. 28, 1987) "What are we doing, Scrubbing Up for Surgery?"*
notes: Summary: Grampa wants Perky to do a better job of washing her hands.

91.title: Perky & Beanz
91.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Beanz starts the popcorn popper, and Yoyo adds a little.

92.title: Perky & Beanz
92.author: Russell Myers.
92.series: Jan. 31, 1987) "His Tail Slammed in the Door Since Morning"*
notes: Summary: Perky & Beanz return and find their faithful dog waiting on the doorstep.

93.title: Perky & Beanz
93.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Perky & Beanz run their vacuum cleaner like a pirate ship.

94.title: Perky & Beanz
94.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Beanz's lawnmower is ruined, he finds he's hit a big bone, and suspects Yoyo.

95.title: Perky & Beanz
95.author: Russell Myers.

notes: Summary: Perky admires Beanz's helpfulness.

98.title: Perky & Beanz
98.author: Russell Myers.
98.series: Feb. 7, 1987) "When They Get Dizzy They Can't Hang On Any More"*
notes: Summary: Perky asks Yoyo why dogs run in circles when they have fleas.

99.title: Perky & Beanz
99.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Beanz slips off a ladder and ends up hanging upsidedown from shutter, gutter and downspout; Yoyo is watching.

notes: Summary: Yoyo has his own way of guarding in basketball.

101.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Perky tells Yoyo to dribble and shoot the basketball, and Yoyo punctures it.

notes: Summary: Beanz introduces himself and Yoyo to a man sharing the park bench with them.

103.title: Perky & Beanz

notes: Summary: The parakeet is perched on Perky's nose.

104.title: Perky & Beanz
104.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: The parakeet wants to go along.

105.title: Perky & Beanz
105.author: Russell Myers.
105.series: Feb. 19, 1987) "I Don't Want To Leave My Birdie!"*
notes: Summary: Perky's had the parakeet on her finger all day, and now it's bedtime.

106.title: Perky & Beanz
106.author: Russell Myers.

notes: Summary: Perky wonders what her parakeet is thinking.

107.title: Perky & Beanz
107.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Perky puts her birdie near the window to watch the wild birds teasing.

108.title: Perky & Beanz
108.author: Russell Myers.
108.series: Feb. 23, 1987) "One Crummy Little Hairball can Change Your Life Completely!"*
notes: Summary: Perky's coughing up a hairball, and Yoyo is banished from her bed.

109.title: Perky & Beanz
109.author: Russell Myers.
109.series: Feb. 25, 1987) "Must Be Some Kind of Revenge!"*
notes: Summary: A workman comes along and opens a fire hydrant so it squirts all over Yoyo.

110.title: Perky & Beanz
110.author: Russell Myers.
110.series: Mar. 4, 1987) "I Hate Waiting for the Trot Light to Come On"*
notes: Summary: Yoyo waits for the light to change so he can cross the street.

111.title: Perky & Beanz
111.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Perky has so many house plants she has to rake leaves indoors.

112.title: Perky & Beanz
112.author: Russell Myers.

notes: Summary: Someone's been into Beanz's wallet while he's sleeping.

113.author: Russell Myers.
113.series: March 12, 1987) "You'd Better Go Grab a Sandwich"*
notes: Summary: Perky wants to break the news about her report card gradually.

114.title: Perky & Beanz

notes: Summary: Perky puts coffee in Yoyo's dog dish to help him get going.

115.title: Perky & Beanz
115.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Perky's birdie is hanging upside down on its perch, but says it's not serious.

116.title: Perky & Beanz
116.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Beanz yells and runs from the house with a smoking pan.

117.title: Perky & Beanz
117.author: Russell Myers.
117.series: March 17, 1987) "We Do That When Our Watch Stops!"*
notes: Summary: Perky sees Yoyo wag his tail and stretch, but wonders why he's shaking his wrist.

118.title: Perky & Beanz

118.series: March 30, 1987) "No Dessert For You Until You Eat Your Vegetables"*
notes: Summary: Perky tries to sneak her vegetables into Yoyo's dish.

notes: Summary: The students aren't making the teacher's job easy.

notes: Summary: The teacher's plan means that Perky now has to shout her gossip.
